name: The Platformer Gun
description: Use your Platformer gun to create your way to surpass the obstacles and escape big evil dudes in 80+ levels!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 2 GHz or better Memory: 512 MB RAM MB RAM Graphics: Any OpenGL/Direct3D compatible card with 256MB+ vRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: probably
